description.raw:
Add solar array model for task 2. This is what it looks like near the robot:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3098481060-solararray.png)

* It's a static model
* Used same contact params as other models
* The cable is being modeled as a separate model, so it's not included in this pull request.
* There is one large box collision for the area which will touch other models:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/687235494-array3.png)

* For the rest of the model, I used the trimesh for collision. With the detail that I made it slightly smaller than the visual. So in the box area, we know objects will be touching the box, not the trimesh. And in the rest of the model, there's a slight offset between visual and collision. Here's the difference between the visuals on the box corner, when hiding the extra box collision:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/643693846-array4.png)
